description: A site with Phoenician origins (founded ca. 730-700 B.C.) located in southwestern Sardinia. Site of a Roman naval victory against Carthage by Gaius Sulpicius Paterculus in 258 B.C. during the First Punic War.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: S. Antioco
